name: Demon Destructor
description:
Enter a cold world were you have to face the demons that try to rip your heart out.

Kill as many demons as you can, level up , get powers and set a new high score.

Fight and kill these demons before they kill you. Good luck and survive.

Oh and aim for the heart.

Controls:

movement keys: W,A,S,D

Jump Key: Spacebar

Fire Key: Left Click

Powers Key: Q
